DOC.brief_summary: Professional interpretation improve quality care patient limit English proficiency ( LEP ) . Remote method professional interpretation , include telephone video , hold great promise expand access , limit data exist relative impact modality patient care provider uptake . Comparing modality impact multiple aspect health care quality , include family comprehension , provider communication , consistency provider interpreter use inform dissemination strategy delivery safe , efficient , equitable care LEP family . Aim 1 : To determine whether randomly assign remote interpreter modality ( telephone versus video ) impact parent-reported quality communication interpretation , diagnosis comprehension , length stay ( LOS ) among LEP Spanish-speaking family see pediatric Emergency Department ( ED ) . Hypothesis 1 : Parent-reported quality communication interpretation parent diagnosis comprehension high among family assign video interpretation compare telephone interpretation . Hypothesis 2 : LOS differ family assign video telephone interpretation . Aim 2 : To determine whether assigned interpreter modality associate provider decision communicate without professional interpretation . Hypothesis 3 : Parent-reported provider communication without professional interpretation ( e.g . use patient family member interpret part visit ) low family assign video interpretation compare telephone interpretation .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Remote Interpreter Modalities Pediatric Emergency Department
